GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
clk: imx: scu: fix memleak on platform_device_add() fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 9209e6bab75d4008d9f4248c66008f3ffd24c931, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 77d8f3068c63ee0983f0b5ba3207d3f7cce11be4. For more details please see the references link.
